name: R-T-F
description: Defines the role, task, and format

components.label: Role
components.helpText: The persona or role the AI should adopt (e.g., "Facebook Ad Marketer")

components.label: Task
components.helpText: The specific task you want the AI to perform (e.g., "Design a Facebook ad campaign")
components.example: Design a compelling Facebook ad campaign to promote a new line of fitness apparel for a sports brand.

components.label: Format
components.helpText: How the AI should present the output (e.g., "Create a storyboard")
components.example: Create a storyboard outlining the sequence of ad creatives, including ad copy, visuals, and targeting strategy.

name: T-A-G
description: Defines a task, an action, and a goal

components.label: Task
components.helpText: What task needs to be done
components.example: The task is to evaluate the performance of team members

components.label: Action
components.example: Act as a Direct manager and assess the strengths and weaknesses of team members

components.label: Goal
components.example: Goal is to improve team performance so that the average user satisfaction score moves from 6 to 7.5 in the next quarter

name: B-A-B
description: Defines the before, after, and bridge

components.label: Before
components.example: We're nowhere to be seen on SEO rankings

components.label: After
components.example: We want to be in top 10 SEO ranking in our niche in 90 days

components.label: Bridge
components.example: Develop a detailed plan for mentioning all the measures we should take also include list of top 20 keywords

name: C-A-R-E
description: Defines the Context, Action, Result, and Example

components.label: Context
components.example: We are launching a new line of sustainable clothing

components.label: Action
components.example: Can you assist us in creating a targeted advertising campaign that emphasizes our environmental commitment?

components.label: Result
components.example: Our desired outcome is to drive product awareness and sales

components.label: Example
components.example: A good example of a similar successful initiative is Patagonia's "Don't Buy This Jacket" campaign, which highlighted their commitment to sustainability while enhancing their brand image.

name: R-I-S-E
description: Defines the Role, Input, Steps, and Expectation

components.label: Role
components.example: Imagine you are a content strategist

components.label: Input
components.example: I've gathered detailed information about our target audience, including their interests & common questions related to our industry.

components.label: Steps
components.example: Provide a Step by Step content strategy plan identifying key topics based on our audience insights, creating an editorial calendar, and drafting engaging content that aligns with our brand message.

components.label: Expectation
components.example: Aim is to increase our blog's monthly visitors by 40% and Enhance our brand's position as a thought leader in our industry.
